b:include.name: all-head-content
b:include.b:skin: html, body { height: 100%; overflow: auto;}.purex-button-download{ width: 300px; padding: 0; line-height: 40px; font-size: 16px; } .purex-button-download-ready { background: #57b792; } .purex-button-download { text-shadow: 0 1px 4px rgba(0,0,0,.1); background: #de5733; color: #fff; position: relative; transition: .6s; overflow: hidden; } .purex-button { display: inline-block; font-family: inherit; font-size: 100%; padding: .7em 1em; border: 1px solid #999; border: none transparent; text-decoration: none; border-radius: 2px; zoom: 1; line-height: normal; white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: middle; text-align: center; cursor: pointer; -webkit-user-drag: none; -webkit-user-select: none; -moz-user-select: none; -ms-user-select: none; user-select: none; box-sizing: border-box; }>
